title: Fantastic Location; Great Property
text:
I enjoyed staying here. The location is amazing: near the Louvre, the Gardens and all of the shops. They also have a nice gym and spa.The staff is also very nice and welcoming. You feel very much at home.
I think the food and beverage costs are extremely pricey for the offerings. Nonetheless, I would stay here again in a heartbeat. I liked the property alot.
Room Tip: All the rooms are nice. Excellent location and property See more room tips
